Feedback Sent Your feedback has been sent successfully.\nThank you! Failed to send feedback Please enter feedback This is the feedback feature where you can send us your feedback!\n\n 1. Enter your feedback: Type your feedback in the textbox provided.\n 2. Send your feedback: When you\'re done, tap the "Send Feedback" button to send it to us!\n 3. Confirmation: If your feedback is successfully sent, you will see a pop-up stating "Feedback Sent", along with a message indicating a successful feedback submission.\n\n Thank you for your feedbacks! We will receive them within 1-2 working days.\n If you have any questions. please contact support.\n
Help This is the timer feature where you can set and manage timers.\n\n 1. Set Alarm: Choose from the 3 pre-set timings or enter your own timing in HH:MM:SS format.\n 2. Set Alarm Purpose: Enter the purpose of your alarm.\n 3. Start Timer: Start, pause, resume and stop your timer anytime.\n 4. Timer History: Go to Timer History to view all your previous timers.\n\n If you have any questions, please contact support. HabitTracker No description available Start Date: Start Date: Not available Set a new habit! Habit Clicked Delete Habit Are you sure you want to delete the habit? Cancel Cancelled habit deleted This is the HabitTracker feature, where you can create and track habits for yourself to follow!\n\n 1. Create Habits: You can track up to 4 at a time!\n 2. Update Habit: Update your habits with new data whenever!\n 3. View Charts: View the charts to find out more about your habits with the various sorting features!\n 4. Gain Insights: Learn more about your habits with this page!\n\n If you have any questions, please contact support.
